ca.mcgill.ecse211.model

Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.model.Navigation

  • public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the methods that contribute to making the robot move.
    Author:
    Carlo D'Angelo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int FORWARD_SPEED
      Forward speed (in degrees/second) of the robot for the majority of the navigation.
      private static int FORWARD_SPEED_WEIGHT
      Speed (in degrees/second) of the robot when detecting the weight of the can (Touch Sensor).
      private EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor 
      static double minAng
      Minimum angle that the robot turns to when calling the travelTo() method.
      private Odometer odo 
      private double RADIUS 
      private EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor 
      private static int ROTATION_SPEED
      Rotation speed (in degrees/second) of the robot for the majority of the navigation.
      private static int SLOW_SPEED
      Speed (in degrees/second) of the robot when it scans the cans in the search zone.
      static double TILE_SIZE
      Length and width of a tile (in cm).
      private double TRACK

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int convertAngle(double radius, double width, double angle)
      This method converts a rotation in place into the total rotation (in degrees) of each wheel needed to cause that rotation.

      This method converts a distance into the total rotation (in degrees) of each wheel needed to cover that distance.

      Method that allows the robot to move backward.

      Method that allows robot to travel from its current position to any other point.
      void turnTo(double theta)
      Method that allows the robot to rotate in place.
      void turnToScan(double theta)

           throws OdometerExceptions

        Parameters:
        leftMotor - left motor of robot
        rightMotor - right motor of robot

        OdometerExceptions

    • Method Detail

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo(double x,
                     double y)
        Method that allows robot to travel from its current position to any other point.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of desired destination
        y - y coordinate of desired destination

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(double theta)
        Method that allows the robot to rotate in place.
        Parameters:
        theta - angle amount (in degrees) that you want the robot to rotate in place

      • driveBack

        public void driveBack(double distance)
        Method that allows the robot to move backward.
        Parameters:
        distance - distance that you want the robot to travel backward

      • driveForward

        public void driveForward(double distance)
        Method that allows the robot to move forward.
        Parameters:
        distance - distance that you want the robot to travel forward

      • driveForwardWeight

        public void driveForwardWeight(double distance)
        Method that allows the robot to move forward and allows other code to run.
        Parameters:
        distance - distance that you want the robot to travel forward

      • turnToScan

        public void turnToScan(double theta)
        This method is only used when scanning for a can in the search zone. It is similar to turnTo(), but the motors rotate at a slower speed, and return instantly rather than wait for the robot to rotate.
        Parameters:
        theta - angle amount (in degrees) that you want the robot to rotate in place

      • convertDistance

        public static int convertDistance(double radius,
                                  double distance)
        This method converts a distance into the total rotation (in degrees) of each wheel needed to cover that distance.
        Parameters:
        RADIUS - radius of wheel
        distance - distance that you want the robot to move
        Returns:
        total rotation (in degrees) of each wheel needed to cover a distance

      • convertAngle

        public static int convertAngle(double radius,
                               double width,
                               double angle)
        This method converts a rotation in place into the total rotation (in degrees) of each wheel needed to cause that rotation.
        Parameters:
        radius - radius of wheel
        width - distance between centers of wheels
        angle - angle (in place) that you want the robot to rotate
        Returns:
        total rotation (in degrees) of each wheel needed to cause a rotation in place
